mapper.select: select pr.id , pr.positioner_review_tips, pr.created_date , pr.updated_date , n.notice_title , a.apply_type , a.apply_status , m.member_name , m.member_email , e.evaluation_overall , e.evaluation_difficulty , e.evaluation_result from tbl_positioner_review pr join tbl_apply a on pr.apply_id = a.id join tbl_notice n on a.notice_id = n.id join tbl_corporation c on n.corporation_id = c.id join tbl_resume r on a.resume_id = r.id join tbl_member m on r.member_id = m.id left join tbl_evaluation_positioner ep on pr.id = ep.positioner_review_id left join tbl_evaluation e on ep.id = e.id where c.id = #{corporationId} order by pr.created_date desc
